tr.title: Petrol Dogalgaz Jeotermal
tr.description: Petrol, dogalgaz ve jeotermal enerji sektorlerinde kullanilan ekipmanlar icin ozel yuzey kaplama cozumleri sunuyoruz.
tr.intro: Enerji sektoru ekipmanlari son derece zorlu kosullarda calisir. Yuksek basinc, asindirici ortamlar ve surekli temas, parcalarin hizla asinmasina neden olur.

technicalSpecs.title: Sondaj Bitleri
technicalSpecs.description: Tungsten karbur ve diamond coating ile asiri asinma direnci

technicalSpecs.title: Pompa Parcalari
technicalSpecs.description: Kavitasyon ve erozyon direnci yuksek HVOF kaplamalar

en.title: Oil Natural Gas Geothermal
en.description: We offer special surface coating solutions for equipment used in oil, natural gas and geothermal energy sectors.
en.intro: Energy sector equipment operates under extremely harsh conditions. High pressure, abrasive environments and continuous contact cause parts to wear out quickly.

technicalSpecs.title: Drill Bits
technicalSpecs.description: Extreme wear resistance with tungsten carbide and diamond coating

technicalSpecs.title: Pump Parts
technicalSpecs.description: HVOF coatings with high cavitation and erosion resistance

tr.title: Madencilik
tr.description: Madencilik ekipmanlarinin zorlu calisma kosullarina dayanmasi icin tungsten karbur ve hardfacing kaplamalar uyguluyoruz.
tr.intro: Madencilik ekipmanlari tas mineral ve toprakla surekli temas halindedir.

technicalSpecs.title: Kirici Ceneler
technicalSpecs.description: Hardfacing ile darbe ve asinma direnci

en.title: Mining
en.description: We apply tungsten carbide and hardfacing coatings for mining equipment to withstand harsh working conditions.
en.intro: Mining equipment is in constant contact with rock minerals and soil.

technicalSpecs.title: Crusher Jaws
technicalSpecs.description: Impact and wear resistance with hardfacing
